inputRoles.name: test_dataset

inputRoles.description: Dataset containing the codes to be compared.

inputRoles.name: embedding_folder

inputRoles.description: Folder containing the pre-trained word embeddings.

outputRoles.name: output_dataset
outputRoles.label: Output Dataset
outputRoles.description: Table containing the code pairs (Baseline â€“ Test) along with similarity distances and ranking.

params.name: text_column_test
params.label: Test Dataset Text Column

params.name: embedding_is_custom

params.name: advanced_settings
